dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, B, guess what big news just dropped in the travel sector?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, B, guess what big news just dropped in the travel sector?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, do tell! Uh, is it about, like, new destinations? I'm always hoping for something exciting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, do tell! Uh, is it about, like, new destinations? I'm always hoping for something exciting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Close! It's actually about resuming flights. Air Astana, um, they're bringing back flights to the Middle East.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Close! It's actually about resuming flights. Air Astana, um, they're bringing back flights to the Middle East.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Air Astana will resume flights to the Middle East starting June 25.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Really? Wow, that's, that's sooner than I think a lot of people expected. When is that happening?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really? Wow, that's, that's sooner than I think a lot of people expected. When is that happening?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Starting June 25th. And the big reason, apparently, is, uh, following the ceasefire in the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Starting June twenty fifth. And the big reason, apparently, is, uh, following the ceasefire in the region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Air Astana will resume flights to the Middle East starting June 25. According to a statement from the airline, operations to the region are restarting following the ceasefire in the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that makes sense. [interrupts] But what about, like, safety? I mean, things have been pretty tense there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that makes sense. But what about, like, safety? I mean, things have been pretty tense there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. They're saying all flights will be routed around Iranian airspace specifically for safety reasons.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. They're saying all flights will be routed around Iranian airspace specifically for safety reasons.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Flights will be routed around Iranian airspace for safety.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, that's a smart move. And, uh, I heard something about a special flight, too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, that's a smart move. And, uh, I heard something about a special flight, too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You got it. There's a repatriation flight, KC8980, from Dubai to Almaty, at 5:40 p.m. on the 25th. They're even using their biggest plane, a Boeing 767, for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You got it. There's a repatriation flight, K C eight thousand, nine hundred eighty, from Dubai to Almaty, at five forty p m. on the twenty fifth. They're even using their biggest plane, a Boeing seven hundred sixty seven, for it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, a special repatriation flight, KC8980 Dubai-Almaty, will be operated at 5:40 p.m. on the airline™s largest-capacity aircraft, Boeing 767, to accommodate returning passengers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's good they're getting people home. I remember, um, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs had issued a pretty serious warning earlier, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's good they're getting people home. I remember, um, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs had issued a pretty serious warning earlier, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kazakhstan™s Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued a warning to citizens planning holidays in Middle Eastern countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! So this is a pretty significant shift. Air Astana is, like, stressing that safety's their top priority, highest international standards, all that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! So this is a pretty significant shift. Air Astana is, like, stressing that safety's their top priority, highest international standards, all that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All flights will be operated in full compliance with the highest international safety standards, as the safety of our passengers and crew remain our top priority, the airline noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I'd hope so. [interrupts] So, anyone planning to fly, they should probably check the website for their specific flight status.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I'd hope so. So, anyone planning to fly, they should probably check the website for their specific flight status.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Passengers are advised to check following flights status at Air Astana website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Always good to double-check those flight statuses on the Air Astana site. Don't just show up!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Always good to double-check those flight statuses on the Air Astana site. Don't just show up!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Passengers are advised to check following flights status at Air Astana website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's, uh, positive news for a lot of travelers and, you know, people with family there, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's, uh, positive news for a lot of travelers and, you know, people with family there, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. A step towards, you know, some kind of normalcy in the region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. A step towards, you know, some kind of normalcy in the region.
